## EthersGivetyStoreOption type

Possible values for the optional [useStore](./lib-ethers.ethersgivetyconnectionoptionalparams.usestore.md) connection parameter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type EthersGivetyStoreOption = "blockPolled";
```

## Remarks

Currently, the only supported value is `"blockPolled"`<!-- -->, in which case a [BlockPolledGivetyStore](./lib-ethers.blockpolledgivetystore.md) will be created.
